column4: how come i can't unmount my external harddrive, it says it cant unmount it (i was root....) and then it remounts them....
perhaps there is a process that has "locked onto" the drive and claims that it has an unfinished io operatation.
You could just keep killing processes until it lets you unmount. =P
i thought about that..., so i removed it and replugged it in and tryed to unmount it......
